injuries.longComment: Sasser has missed two straight preseason games for undisclosed reasons. It's unclear if Sasser is even dealing with an injury, but his status is worth monitoring ahead of Opening Night, especially with Jaden Ivey (knee) slated to miss at least the first month of the campaign.
injuries.shortComment: Sasser didn't play in Thursday's 119-98 preseason win over the Wizards.

items.headline: Sasser didn't play in Thursday's 119-98 preseason win over the Wizards.
items.text: Sasser has missed two straight preseason games for undisclosed reasons. It's unclear if Sasser is even dealing with an injury, but his status is worth monitoring ahead of Opening Night, especially with Jaden Ivey (knee) slated to miss at least the first month of the campaign.

injuries.longComment: The procedure and discomfort are unrelated to the fibula injury Ivey suffered last season, per the Pistons' press release, but this is still a devastating injury to Detroit's backcourt, which also lost Malik Beasley and Tim Hardaway this offseason. In Ivey's absence, Caris LeVert (undisclosed), Duncan Robinson, Ronald Holland, Marcus Sasser and Chaz Lanier are all candidates for increased roles to start the season. Ivey
injuries.shortComment: The Pistons announced Thursday that Ivey underwent an arthroscopic procedure to relieve right knee discomfort and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.

items.headline: The Pistons announced Thursday that Ivey underwent an arthroscopic procedure to relieve right knee discomfort and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.
items.text: The procedure and discomfort are unrelated to the fibula injury Ivey suffered last season, per the Pistons' press release, but this is still a devastating injury to Detroit's backcourt, which also lost Malik Beasley and Tim Hardaway this offseason. In Ivey's absence, Caris LeVert (undisclosed), Duncan Robinson, Ronald Holland, Marcus Sasser and Chaz Lanier are all candidates for increased roles to start the season. Ivey

injuries.longComment: Jones signed a two-way contract with the Pistons on July 23, but a left ankle injury will delay his participation in training camp, if not keep him out entirely. He appeared in 39 regular-season games last season -- 15 with the Wizards and 24 with the Kings -- averaging 4.0 points, 2.2 rebounds and 1.1 assists in 13.2 minutes.
injuries.shortComment: Pistons president of basketball operations Trajan Langdon said Monday that Jones (ankle) will not be available to start training camp, Eric Vincent of ClutchPoints reports.

items.headline: Pistons president of basketball operations Trajan Langdon said Monday that Jones (ankle) will not be available to start training camp, Eric Vincent of ClutchPoints reports.
items.text: Jones signed a two-way contract with the Pistons on July 23, but a left ankle injury will delay his participation in training camp, if not keep him out entirely. He appeared in 39 regular-season games last season -- 15 with the Wizards and 24 with the Kings -- averaging 4.0 points, 2.2 rebounds and 1.1 assists in 13.2 minutes.
